topic.title: Exploring the GLPI interface
topic.shortdesc: Depending on the user's profile, menus may be different but the logic of the interface remains the same.

body.p: GLPI's interface consists of five areas involving the application functionality based on their nature.

ol.li: The user menu allows you to manage preferences, access help and logout
The main menu lets you navigate through the different modules
The breadcrumb navigation provides some context for using the main work area
The entity selector menu lets you interact with the entity context
The main work area is the preferred region for interaction with the application
